cu.explanation_en: Setting remote_s_portc to 0 (invalid port number) will cause F1 interface configuration failure and prevent CU-DU communication.

du.explanation_en: Setting ssb_periodicityServingCell to 15 (valid range 0-7) will cause SSB periodicity configuration validation failure and prevent SSB transmission.
du.explanation_zh: 將 ssb_periodicityServingCell 設定為 15（有效範圍 0-7）會導致 SSB 週期配置驗證失敗，並阻止 SSB 傳輸。
